messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Det. O'Nell DeNoux Jr Officer Context: Involved in various aspects of the investigation, such as conducting line-ups, securing voluntary statements, receiving information and evidence, and interacting with other officers and personnel. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Technician Larry Morin Officer Context: Photographed a line-up, processed a crime scene, took photos of the crime scene, secured unknown hair samples, and collected various evidence from the crime scene. Officer Role: Technician. Officer Name: Sergeant Sherman Officer Context: Provided information about a suspect, Larry W. Ledet, including details about a firearm registered to him. Also informed Detective DeNoux about a suspect being returned to the crime scene. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Sergeant Lynn Sherman Officer Context: Informed Detective DeNoux telephonically about a suspect that had been returned to the crime scene. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Deputy David Dussel Officer Context: Returned a black male to the scene of the crime for Mrs. Betty Neff to identify. Officer Role: Deputy Officer Name: Detective Sergeant Masson Officer Context: Arrived with Detective DeNoux at Sweet Memories Antique Shop after an incident. Involved in the investigation process. Officer Role: Detective Sergeant Officer Name: Technician William Viera Officer Context: Met Detective DeNoux at the Criminal Investigations Division. Received evidence from Detective DeNoux and took photos of an injury. Officer Role: Technician Officer Name: Defective Marco Nuzzolillo Officer Context: Conducted a physical lineup at the Jefferson Parish Correctional Center. Officer Role: Detective
